import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'; import Jobs from './pages/Jobs'; import Candidates from './pages/Candidates'; import Assessments from './pages/Assessments'; import Header from './components/common/Header'; import ErrorBoundary from './components/common/ErrorBoundary'; import './styles/main.css'; const App: React.FC = () => { return (

Welcome to TalentFlow

Your comprehensive hiring platform for managing jobs, candidates, and assessments.

💼

Manage Jobs

Create, edit, and organize job postings with drag-and-drop reordering.

View Jobs
👥

Track Candidates

Manage candidate pipeline with kanban boards and detailed profiles.

View Candidates
📝

Create Assessments

Build custom assessments with live preview and conditional questions.

View Assessments
); }; export default App;
